descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][u]SKAL SEFAR FOLLOWER
[/u][/b][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][i]This mod is a addition to the normal vanilla followers of TESV. Her name is Skal Sefar. Her AI is brave and she mostly seems puzzled, this relates to someone that I know in real... NOT MENTIONING ANY NAMES ;) May update her appearance soon look out for that!

[/i][/size][/font][u][font=Georgia][size=4][b]FILES
[/b][/size][/font][/u][i][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Skal Sefar is a .esp folder and it usually complies with most mods, if not notify me and I will have a look. It really shouldn't mess around as it has a vanilla build. It is completely lore friendly, keep playing how you want.

Contributers: SkalDovah

[/size][/font][b]
[/b][/i]
author: SkalDovah
